BarkNitrogenConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of nitrogen per unit of dry bark mass.

BarkPhosphorousConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of phosphorus per unit of bark dry mass

BarkThickness.comment: The thickness of the part of the stem that is external to the wood including vascular cambium.

BranchMaintenanceRespirationAtGivenTempe.comment: The rate of branch maintenance respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit branch area.
The rate of branch maintenance respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit branch mass.

BranchNitrogenConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of nitrogen per unit of dry branch mass.

BranchTotalRespirationAtGivenTemperature.comment: The rate of branch total respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit branch area.
The rate of branch total respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit branch mass.

BranchWoodCarbonConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of carbon per unit of dry branch wood mass.

CanopyDiameterAlongLongestAxis.comment: The largest dimension of a plant canopy.

CanopyDiameterPerpendicularToFirstAxis.comment: The dimension of a plant canopy perpendicular to the largest dimension.

CanopyHeightObserved.comment: The shortest distance between the upper boundary of the main photosynthetic tissues on a plant and the ground level.

CoarseRootCarbonConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of carbon per unit of dry coarse root mass.

CoarseRootPhosphorusConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of phosphorus per unit of coarse root dry mass.

DispersuleHeight.comment: The third linear dimension of a dispersule.

DispersuleLength.comment: The largest linear dimension of a dispersule.

DispersuleShape.comment: The variance of the three dimensions, length width and height, divided by each dimension's length so that length is unity.

DispersuleWidth.comment: The smallest linear dimension of a dispersule.

EpidermalCellArea.comment: The cross-sectional area of an epidermis cell.

FineRootFrostHardiness.comment: The ability of fine roots to withstand frost.

FineRootNitrogenConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of nitrogen per unit of dry fine root mass.

LeafAbsorbance.comment: The ratio of light absorbed by a leaf relative to incoming radiation.

LeafAngle.comment: The average angle of the leaf relative to horizontal.

LeafArea.comment: The one-sided projected surface area of a single leaf or leaf lamina.

LeafAreaPerSapwoodArea.comment: The total leaf area of the canopy divided by the sapwood area.

LeafCarbonConcentrationPerArea.comment: The total amount of carbon per unit of leaf area (one-sided).

LeafCarbonConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of carbon per unit of dry leaf mass.

LeafCarbonDelta13.comment: The 13C/12C ratio of leaf biomass relative to that of a standard (usually Pee Dee Belemnite).

LeafCellMeanSize.comment: The average volume of a leaf cell.

LeafCompoundness.comment: The extent and scheme of the compoundness of a leaf.

LeafDryMatterContent.comment: The oven dry mass of a leaf divided by its water saturated fresh mass.

LeafEpidermalCellSize.comment: The largest dimension of an epidermis cell as measured on a leaf cross-section.

LeafFrostHardiness.comment: The ability of a leaf/bud to withstand frost.

LeafJmaxAtAmbientTemperaturePerArea.comment: The maximum electron transport rate per unit leaf area measured at ambient temperature.

LeafJmaxAtAmbientTemperaturePerMass.comment: The maximum electron transport rate per unit leaf mass measured at ambient temperature.

LeafLaminaCellLowerEpidermisArea.comment: The cross-sectional area of a cell from lower epidermis (hypodermis).

LeafLifespan.comment: The time period during which an individual leaf or part of a leaf is alive and physiologically active.

LeafLitterNitrogenConcentrationPerArea.comment: The total amount of nitrogen per unit of leaf litter area (one-sided).

LeafMaintenanceRespirationAtGivenTempera.comment: The rate of leaf maintenance respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit leaf area.

LeafMassPerArea.comment: The oven-dry mass of a leaf divided by its one-sided area.

LeafMesophyllCellArea.comment: The cross-sectional area of a mesophyll cell.

LeafMesophyllCellHeight.comment: The largest dimension of a mesophyll cell as measured on a leaf cross-section.

LeafMesophyllCellVolume.comment: The volume of a leaf mesophyll cell.

LeafMitochondrialRespirationInTheLight_B.comment: The rate of leaf mitochondrial respiration in the light calculated by fitting the Blackman response.

LeafMitochondrialRespirationInTheLight_F.comment: The rate of leaf michondrial respiration measured in the light calculated by fitting the Farquhar-von Caemmerer model to the A-Ci curve.

LeafNitrogenConcentrationPerArea.comment: The total amount of nitrogen per unit of dry leaf mass.

LeafNitrogenConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of nitrogen per unit of leaf area (one-sided).

LeafNumberPerUnitShootLength.comment: The total number of leaves on a shoot divided by its length.

LeafPalatability.comment: The tolerance of a leaf to be not eaten.

LeafPalisadeCellCrossSectionalArea.comment: The cross-sectional area of a cell from palissadic parenchyma.

LeafPhenology.comment: The timing of foliage of the whole canopy.

LeafPhloemCellSize.comment: The cross-sectional area of a phloem cell.

LeafPhosphorusConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of phosphorus per unit of leaf dry mass.

LeafPhosphorusConcentrationperArea.comment: The total amount of phosphorus per unit of leaf area (one-sided).

LeafPuncturability.comment: The resistance of leaf to be punctured.

LeafResistanceToFracture.comment: The force needed to cut a leaf or leaf fragment at a constant angle (e.g. 20°) and speed.

LeafRespirationAtGivenTemperaturePerArea.comment: The rate of leaf total respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit leaf area.

LeafRespirationAtGrowthTemperaturePerMas.comment: The respiration rate adjusted to mean growth season temperature expressed per unit leaf dry mass.

LeafRespirationRatePerArea.comment: The leaf respiration rate at measurement temperature expressed per unit leaf dry mass

LeafRespirationRatePerMass.comment: The leaf respiration rate at measurement temperature expressed per unit leaf area.

LeafSclerenchymaCellSize.comment: The cross-sectional area of a sclerenchyma cell.

LeafSclerophylly.comment: The ability of a leaf to resist dry conditions.

LeafSpecificArea.comment: The one sided area of a fresh leaf devided by its oven-dry mass.

LeafTensileStrength.comment: The force needed to tear a leaf (fragment) divided by its width.

LeafVMaxAt25CPerArea.comment: The maximum carboxylation capacity per unit leaf area measured at 25°C

LeafVmaxAt25CPerMass.comment: The maximum carboxylation capacity per unit leaf mass measured at 25°C.

LeafVmaxAtAmbientTemperaturePerArea.comment: The maximum carboxylation capacity per unit leaf mass at ambient temperature.

LeafWaterPotential.comment: The state of water in the leaf.

LeafXylemCellSize.comment: The cross-sectional area of a xylem cell

LeafbladeLength.comment: The length of a leaf blade.

LeafbladeWidth.comment: The width of a leaf blade.

LeafletArea.comment: The one-sided projected surface area of a single leaflet of a compound leaf.

LeafletLength.comment: The length of a single leaflet of a compound leaf.

LeafletWidth.comment: The width of a single leaflet of a compound leaf.

LitterCarbonConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of carbon per unit of dry litter mass.

LitterDecompostionRate.comment: The rate of litter decomposition measured under standardized conditions.

LitterPhosphorusConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of phosphorus per unit of litter dry mass.

PlantBranchingArchitecture.comment: The branching architecture of a plant.

PlantClonality.comment: The cloning capacity of a plant.

PlantConduitArea.comment: The cross-sectional area of conduits (vessels or tracheids) in a trunk.

PlantConduitDensity.comment: Number of conduits (vessels and tracheids) per unit area of conduits (vessels or tracheids) in a trunk.

PlantConduitLumenAreaPerSapwoodArea.comment: The proportion of stem cross-sectional area that is conducting area.

PlantCotyledonNitrogenConcentrationPerMa.comment: The total amount of nitrogen per unit of dry cotyledon mass.

PlantDispersalSyndrom.comment: Mode of dispersal of dispersule (or propagule: unit of seed fruit or spore as it is dispersed).

PlantFlammability.comment: The ability of a plant species to ignate and spread flames.

PlantFloweringHeightWithHighestLeafElong.comment: The shortest distance between the highest leaf elongated vertically on a plant at the flowering stage and the ground level.

PlantFloweringHeightWithHighestLeafNotEl.comment: The shortest distance between the highest leaf as it spontaneously stands on a plant at the flowering stage and the ground level.

PlantGerminationStimulation.comment: The need for seeds to be stimulated to germinate.

PlantGerminationStimulationByDigestion.comment: The need for seeds to be stimulated by digestion by an animal to germinate.

PlantGrowthForm.comment: Determined in relation to canopy structure and canopy height.

PlantHtAtInflorescenceTop.comment: The shortest distance between the top of the inflorescence and the ground level.

PlantHtObserved.comment: The shortest distance between the upper boundary of the main photosynthetic tissues on a plant and the ground level.

PlantLifeForm.comment: Determined in relation to the position of the perennating (meristematic) tissue to ground surface.

PlantLifeHistory.comment: The common types of timing and duration of survival behavior of individual plants in the absence of disturbances or catastrophes.

PlantLifespan.comment: The length of time a plant remains alive.

PlantMaxHtObsrvdOfLeaf.comment: The shortest distance between the highest leaf borne by plant and the ground level.

PlantMaximumHeight.comment: The maximum vegetative height recorded for the species.

PlantMaximumHeightObservedOfFlower.comment: The shortest distance between the highest flower borne by plant and the ground level.

PlantMaximumLongevity.comment: The maximum length of time a plant remains alive.

PlantMultiStemness.comment: Does a plant have multi-stems or not?

PlantNitrogenFixationCapacity.comment: The capacity of a plant to fix nitrogen.

PlantNutrientUptakeCapacity.comment: The mode of uptake of main macronutrients (mainly nitrogen and phosphorus).

PlantPhotosyntheticRatePerArea.comment: The maximum photosynthetic rate per leaf area at measurement temperature.

PlantPhotosyntheticRatePerDryMass.comment: The maximum photosynthetic rate per leaf dry mass at measurement temperature.

PlantPollinationSyndrome.comment: The mode by which a plant is pollinated.

PlantRegenerationAfterFire.comment: The type of regeneration after fire.

PlantReleasingHeight.comment: The height at which mature seeds are spontaneously released.

PlantReproductiveHeight.comment: The shortest distance between the top of reproductive structures and the ground level.

PlantResproutingCapacityAfterClipping.comment: The ability of a plant to resprout after clipping.

PlantResproutingCapacityAfterDisturbance.comment: The ability of a plant to resprout after destruction of most of its aboveground biomass.

PlantResproutingCapacityAfterFire.comment: The ability of a plant to resprout after fire.

PlantSaplingAgeOfMaturity.comment: The mean age of saplings at the first successful reproduction i.e. when most of the saplings produce the first seed crop.

PlantSpiniscence.comment: The presence and amount of spines.

PlantToleranceToDrought.comment: The ability of a plant to withstand drought.

PlantToleranceToFrost.comment: The ability of a plant to withstand frost.

PlantToleranceToHighTemperatures.comment: The ability of a plant to withstand high temperatures.

PlantToleranceToShade.comment: The ability of a plant to withstand low light conditions.

PlantToleranceToWindthrow.comment: The ability of a plant to withstand windthrows.

PlantTotalNitrogenConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of nitrogen per unit of dry total plant mass.

PlantTypicalHeight.comment: The shortest distance between the upper boundary of the main photosynthetic tissues on a plant and the ground level.

PlantVegetativeHeight.comment: The shortest distance between the upper boundary of the main photosynthetic tissues on a plant and the ground level.

PlantVegetativeHeightNotElongated.comment: The shortest distance between the upper boundary of the main photosynthetic tissues on a plant as it spontaneously stands and the ground level.

PlantWoodiness.comment: The occurrence and distribution of wood along the stem.

RootCambiumFrostHardiness.comment: The ability of the root cambium to withstand frost.

RootDepth.comment: The depth of the longest root of a plant.

RootDepthDistribution.comment: A measure of how the root biomass of an individual is distributed vertically through the soil per unit depth.

RootDepthWith95percentBiomass.comment: An estimate of the depth above which 95% of the root biomass of a species is located.

RootFrostHardiness.comment: The ability of roots to withstand frost.

RootMaintenanceRespirationAtGivenTempPer.comment: The rate of root maintenance respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit root dry mass.

RootMetamorphosis.comment: Describes any metamorphoses of roots e.g. for belowground storage.

RootMycorrhizalType.comment: The mycorrhizal type attached to the rooting system.

RootNitrogenConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of nitrogen per unit of dry root mass.

RootRespirationAtGivenTemperaturePerArea.comment: The rate of root total respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit root area.

RootRespirationAtGivenTemperaturePerMass.comment: The rate of root total respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit root dry mass.

RootShootRatio.comment: The ratio between below-ground and above-ground plant biomass.

RootSpecificLength.comment: The ratio of root length to root mass.

RootTissueDensity.comment: The oven-dry mass of roots divided by their volume when still fresh.

RootVulnerabilityToEmbolism.comment: The sensitivity of the root a plant species to cavitation under highly negative water potantials.

SeedDryMass.comment: The oven-dry mass of a seed.

SeedHeight.comment: The third linear dimension of a seed.

SeedLength.comment: The largest linear dimension of a seed.

SeedLongevity.comment: The time length during which seeds persist in the soil.

SeedMass.comment: The air-dried mass of  a seed.

SeedShape.comment: The variance of the three dimensions length width and height dividing each dimension by length so that length is unity.

SeedWidth.comment: The smallest linear dimension of a seed

SeedlingFrostHardiness.comment: The ability of a seedling to withstand frost.

SeedlingFuncationalMorphology.comment: The morphology of seedlings in relation to cotyledons function and position.

ShootCambiumFrostHardiness.comment: The ability of the shoot cambium to withstand frost.

ShootDiameterAt1.3m.comment: The diameter of a woody plant measured at 1.3 m above the ground.

ShootFrostHardiness.comment: The ability of a shoot to withstand frost.

ShootVulnerabilityToEmbolism.comment: The sensitivity of the shoot a plant species to cavitation under highly negative water potantials.

StemFrostHardiness.comment: The ability of a stem to withstand frost.

StemMaintenanceRespirationAtGivenTempera.comment: The rate of stem maintenance respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit stem area.
The rate of stem maintenance respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit stem mass.
The rate of stem maintenance respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit stem nitrogen.

StemNitrogenConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of nitrogen per unit of dry stem mass.

StemRespirationAtGivenTemperaturePerArea.comment: The rate of stem total respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit stem area.

StemRespirationAtGivenTemperaturePerMass.comment: The rate of stem total respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit stem mass.

StemRespirationAtGivenTemperaturePerNitr.comment: The rate of stem total respiration at specified temperature expressed per unit stem nitrogen.

StemWoodCarbonConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of carbon per unit of dry stem mass.

TwigDryMatterContent.comment: The dry mass of a twig.

TwigFrostHardiness.comment: The ability of a twig to withstand frost.

WoodDensity.comment: The oven-dry mass of a section of a plant's main stem divided by the volume of the same section when still fresh.

WoodNitrogenConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of nitrogen per unit of dry wood mass.

WoodPhosphorusConcentrationPerMass.comment: The total amount of phosphorus per unit of wood dry mass.

XylemSpecificHydraulicConductivity.comment: The rate of water flow per unit cross-sectional xylem area and per unit gradient of pressure.
